original_text: He came to a town in Samaria called Sychar. It was near to the piece of land that Jacob had given to his son, Joseph, many years earlier. 6-
korean_text: 사마리아에 있는 수가라 하는 동네에 이르시니 야곱이 그 아들 요셉에게 준 땅이 가깝고

sentences.original_text: He came to a town in Samaria
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 사마리아에 있는 한 동네에 왔다

sentences.original_text: It was near to the piece of land
that Jacob had given to his son, Joseph
